about.paragraph1: Alex Nothing is a producer, DJ and sound designer whose project sits at the intersection of rhythm and texture. Introduced to music at the age of eight, he began studying drums and percussion in music school, developing an early, physical and instinctive relationship with sound. This foundation later led him to perform in several amateur rock bands, shaping a strong live sensibility and a keen attention to dynamics.
about.paragraph2: His musical culture was formed outside of rigid frameworks. As a teenager, he spent countless hours in his local media library, selecting records almost at random, drawn in by artwork and visual worlds. These explorations fostered an open-minded listening approach, informed as much by rock and nu metal as by pop and electronic music, with a strong influence from UK scenes.
about.paragraph3: With Alex Nothing, the project moves towards a rhythm-driven, textural form of electronic music, free from format or genre constraints. His productions navigate between house, deep house and garage, often built around broken grooves, while maintaining an airy, emotional and ambient dimension. Sound design plays a central role, conceived as both a rhythmic and narrative tool.
about.paragraph4: In both DJ sets and productions, Alex Nothing explores contrasts â€” tension and release, density and space, club energy and introspection. Rejecting fixed labels, he approaches music as a constant field of experimentation, guided by emotion, movement and sonic exploration.

cvItems.item1: Lead Full Stack Developer & Project Manager at TechInnovate Solutions
cvItems.item2: Senior Full Stack Developer specializing in React and Node.js at DataDrive Systems
cvItems.item3: Frontend Developer focused on React and Vue.js at CreativeTech Studios
cvItems.item4: Junior Web Developer with emphasis on JavaScript and PHP at WebWizards Inc.
cvItems.item5: Web Development Intern learning MERN stack at CodeCrafters
cvItems.item6: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, Tech University - Thesis on AI in Web Development
cvItems.item7: Freelance Web Designer specializing in WordPress and Shopify themes
cvItems.item8: Open Source Contributor to React Native project - Implemented key accessibility features
cvItems.item9: Guest Lecturer on Modern Web Technologies at Local Community College
cvItems.item10: Published Author: 'Mastering Full Stack Development' by Tech Publishing House
cvItems.item11: Co-founder and CTO of EdTech startup 'LearnLoop' - Developed MVP and secured seed funding
